Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27613 affecting package git for versions less than 2.45.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27613 affecting package git for versions less than 2.45.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package git is earlier than 2.45.4-1, affected by CVE-2025-27613
